page.title: 18HOME LIFE FOUR CHILDREN
page.content: HERE YOU WILL FIND INFORMATION ABOUT 4 LOCAL CHILDREN. 1.IAN HUNTER aged 7.In his spare time he plays football. Ian likes running and fighting!He has one sister aged 4. He goes to Sunday School. 2.CATHRYN EVANS aged 9.She lives near the school. Her favourite games are netball and rounders. She enjoys living in Northop . She does not attend church.She enjoys Mathematics and English in school. 3.PHILLIP WALLACE aged 10. Philip lives close to the school and he enjoys art. He does not attend church.He also enjoys football and cricket. 4.PENNY WHITE aged 11.She is a very active girl and she likes to play BLOCK 1,2,3.Here you all hide except one person who has to find you. The game is to run back and shout 1,2,3.
